Grimwire { 0.1.0: developer preview }

A User-Driven Web OS.

Welcome to the developer preview!

Grimwire is in its very early stages of development. For the 0.1.x releases, we recommend using it to build personal tools, and to avoid using it in production until the software and security model has fully matured. Please send questions and feedback to the Grimwire Google Group and submit your issues on GitHub. Thanks for your support!

Structured

Grimwire uses Web Workers and REST to create a program architecture in the browser.

Learn More »

User-Driven

Add, modify, and reconfigure applications without hitting the refresh button.

Learn More »

Multi-Threaded

Configure Web Workers with JSON and keep the document clear of application software.

Learn More »

Decentralized

Grimwire's roadmap includes permissions policies and WebRTC integration for host-independent, realtime social computing.

Learn More »

Open-Source

Grimwire is released under the MIT license and is free to deploy anywhere.
